node.title: Former champion boxers plan to take up arms and fight for Ukraine
node.description: Former heavyweight champ Vitali Klitschko said Ukraine is already fighting a "bloody war" and he doesn't have "another choice" but to help fight.
node.content: ["Hall of Fame Ukrainian boxer Vitali Klitschko said he will take up arms to fight Russia as\u00a0attacks on his homeland have continued. Vitali said he will fight alongside his brother and former heavyweight champion Wladimir Klitschko, who enlisted earlier this month into the Ukrainian reserve army.\u00a0", "Vitali, 50, who is also the mayor of the Kyiv, told Good Morning Britain that Ukraine is already fighting a \"bloody war\" and he doesn't have \"another choice.\"\u00a0", "\"I have to do that...I would be fighting,\" the 6-foot-7-inch politician said. Vitali is\u00a0joining calls from the country's minister of defense for civilians over the age of 18 to take up arms to help defend the country.\u00a0", "GMB EXCLUSIVE:", "'I don't have another choice. I have to do that.'", "The Mayor of Kyiv @Vitaliy_Klychko tells @richardgaisford that it is 'already a bloody war' and he is prepared to fight for his country. pic.twitter.com/KvoGP5f92C", "Vitali, who earned the nickname \"Dr. Ironfist\" because of his powerful punches, said on Friday that Kyiv is under threat and the city has entered a \"defensive phase,\" according to Reuters.", "\"Shots and explosions are ringing out in some neighborhoods saboteurs have already entered Kyiv. The enemy wants to put the capital on its knees and destroy us,\" he said in a news briefing as Russian troops got closer to the center of the city.\u00a0", "Vitali's brother Wladimir, 45, wrote in a LinkedIn post on Thursday that \"it is not 'the war of Ukraine,' it is Putin's war.\"\u00a0", "\"He makes it clear that he wants to destroy the Ukrainian state and the sovereignty of its people,\" he said. \"Words are followed by missiles and tanks. Destruction and death come upon us. That's it, blood will mix with tears.\"", "Wladimir warned that the world needs to act if Russian forces take over the Ukrainian capital. \u00a0", "\"If Putin goes ahead with his plan for a change of regime in Kyiv, then democracies around the world must now start thinking about a change of regime in Moscow,\" he said. \"Before it is too late.\"", "Vitali and Wladimir had successful runs as boxers and entered the Guinness World Records with the most heavyweight boxing titles held by brothers. Both brothers also hold doctorates and speak multiple languages.\u00a0", "Christopher Brito is a social media producer and trending writer for CBS News, focusing on sports and stories that involve issues of race and culture."]
